name: Virtual Fighting Champion
description:
In Virtual Fighting Champion, you will fight as best street fighting boy in the city. It is not normal city fighting or fight on the street and a kind of wrestling game where wrestling superstars fight in the street ring with each other but it is a street fighting game where you have to fight with criminals with best martial arts fighting skills, fighting with punching, kicking, blocking and super kicks to take down opponents in the ring battle arena just like superheroes in the city.

- Fight with the super deadly Street Fighting in city
- Play amazing fighting games offline and online
- Upgrade best martial arts and kung Fu fighting skills
- Amazing karate champ and kick boxing games
- Combo fighting games for free
